content:
What a thrill to discover a rare gem! I'd be delighted to help you uncover more information about the album and the artist. Please share as much details as you can about the album, such as:

1. The artist's name (even if it's a pseudonym or a group name)
2. The album title
3. The record label (if it's a major label, independent label, or a private pressing)
4. The release year (if it's printed on the album or if you have an estimate)
5. Any notable musicians or sidemen credited on the album
6. The genre or style of jazz (e.g., modal, free jazz, hard bop, Latin jazz, etc.)
7. Any distinctive features, such as a unique cover art or liner notes

With this information, I can try to help you:

1. Identify the artist and their background
2. Find reviews, articles, or mentions in jazz publications and archives
3. Discover similar artists or albums from the same era
4. Uncover any interesting stories or anecdotes about the album's creation or reception
5. Provide guidance on how to further research or find more information

Keep in mind that it might take some time and digging to uncover information about a lesser-known artist, but I'm excited to help you on this journey!
